page.title: 10Games Children Play
page.content: {TIGGIE ON HIGH}is played by ages 4-9. The idea of the game is for the person who is ON to try and TIG (touch) someone who is not on HIGH (off the floor) When he or she tigs then that other person is on. It continues like that. {THREE IN THE POT}is played by ages 8-11. The object being that the person who is ON tries to TIG a person who, when tigged goes "into the pot". Another person can tig you free but if he is caught in the act and tigged then he must join you in the pot. When three are in the pot then the first person in becomes the Tigger. {SWING BALL}is played by ages 6 & over. The apparatus, which can be bought in sports shops, it consists of a 5ft stand to the top of which is attached a length of string and a tennis ball. A bat is used to strike the ball.
